class.name: tk_behavior/Hover
class.description: Hover Behavior. Let's the QC hover at the last specified position.

class.name: tk_behavior/Ground
class.description: Ground Behavior. Set's Accerleration Mode to Gravity.

class.name: tk_behavior/TakeOff
class.description: TakeOff Behavior. Linearly moves the QC to a certain position.

class.name: tk_behavior/Land
class.description: Land Behavior. Lands quadcopter. Can be configured

class.name: tk_behavior/EmergencyLand
class.description: EmergencyLand Behavior. Lands quadcopter vertically (fastly). Switch to ground. Cannot be configured.
